params.drcRewardPool_: address of the DRC reward pool
params.lpRewardPool_: address of the uniswap LP reward pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Receives rewards from MasterVampire via drain and redistributes

changeDRCRewardPool(address).notice: Changes the address of the DRC->ETH reward pool

changeDistribution(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Changes the distribution percentage         Percentages are using decimal base of 1000 ie: 10% = 100

changeDrainController(address).notice: Changes the address of the Drain controller

changeLPRewardPool(address).notice: Changes the address of the uniswap LP reward pool

changeTreasury(address).notice: Changes the address of the treasury
